text:
#WHO launches global megatrial, called #SOLIDARITY, of the 4 most promising SARS-CoV-2 #coronavirus treatment. #Remdesivir #Chloroquine/#hydroxychloroquine &  #Ritonavir/#lopinavir w/wo #interferonbeta. 
#Influenza drug #favipiravir may be added later.
